contest-event.event-date:
June 12, 1905 D West Stanley Contest (Open Section)
West Stanley Contest (Open Section) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Stanley Contest west-stanley-contest-open-section
West Stanley, County Durham
1st prize £30. 2nd prize £20. 3rd prize £15. 4th prize £10.
March contest 1st (£3) Heworth Colliery, 2nd (£1.10s.) South Moor, 3rd (10s.) Ouston Institute,. It would appear that the march contest was combined with the Amateur Contest.
Feb. 11, 2012, 9:44 a.m. Feb. 11, 2012, 10:26 a.m.
1 Heworth Colliery Band William Heap Beethoven's Works [arr. Swift]
2 Murton Colliery Band Alexander Owen Die Walküre
3 South Moor Colliery Silver Prize Band William Heap Rossini's Works
4 New Shildon Temperance H. Gibbon Rossini's Works
